description:
Jensen Ackles shows the before and after of having to shave his beard to start filming on the upcoming ninth season of Supernatural.Jensen Ackles在秋季播出的《邪恶力量》第九季开拍前跟大家秀了秀自己有胡子和没胡子的造型。

The 35-year-old actor welcomed his first child with wife Danneel Harris just over a month ago and it looks like he decided to let his beard grow out while caring for baby Justice!这位35岁的男演员一个月前刚刚和妻子Danneel Harris迎来了他们第一个孩子，看来他似乎是打算为了孩子留胡子了！

“From Dad to Dean in 6 seconds! #SPN #901 #hiatusbeard,” Supernatural director Guy Norman Bee tweeted along with a Vine video of the transformation.“爸爸6秒钟变Dean！#SPN#901#hiatusbeard,”《邪恶力量》导演Guy Norman Bee在Twitter上发了一条Jensen有胡子和没胡子版的变形视频。

title: 《邪恶力量》男主角Jensen络腮胡子造型示人
